rukus.text: 84|1|Dangtian zhan lie,
84|2|tingcong zhuming, erqie yi yu tingcong de shihou;
84|3|dangdi zhankai,
84|4|bing pao qi suo huai, erqie bian wei kongxu,
84|5|tingcong zhuming, erqie yi yu tingcong de shihou;
84|6|ren a! Ni biding mianli gongzuo, zhidao huijian ni de zhu, ni jiang kan dao ziji de laoji.
84|7|Zhiyu yong youshou jieguo gongguo bu zhe,
84|8|jiang shou jianyi de jihe,
84|9|er xinggaocailie de fan yu ta de jiashu;
84|10|zhiyu cong beihou jieshou gongguo bu zhe,
84|11|jiang jiaokuliantian,
84|12|ru yu liehuo zhi zhong,
84|13|congqian ta zai jiashu jian yuan shi kuaile de,
84|14|ta yi caixiang ta jue bu hui gui yu zhu.
84|15|Buran, ta de zhu, yuan shi jian cha ta de.
84|16|Wo yi wanxia mengshi,
84|17|yi heiye ji qi baoluowanxiang de mengshi,
84|18|yi yuanman shi de yueliang mengshi,
84|19|nimen biding zaoyu chongchong de zainan.
84|20|Tamen zen neng bu xindao ne?
84|21|Dang bieren dui tamen xuandu “gulanjing” de shihou, tamen zenme bu koutou ne?
84|22|Buran, bu xindao de renmen, shi fouren zhenli de,
84|23|an la quan zhidao tamen xinzhong yincang de dongxi,
84|24|gu ni dang yi yi zhong tongku de xingfa xiang tamen baoxi,
84|25|wei xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, jiang shou buduan de baochou.
